mapper.insert: insert into product_tbl (pid, title, i_price, startprice, nowprice, buytype, tendercnt, quantity, desc_product, createdate) values (seq_product.nextval, #{title}, #{i_price}, #{startprice}, #{nowprice}, #{buytype}, #{tendercnt}, #{quantity}, #{desc_product}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update product_tbl set title=#{title}, i_price=#{i_price}, startprice=#{startprice}, buytype=#{buytype}, quantity=#{quantity} desc_product=#{desc_product}, where pid=#{pid}
mapper.select:
select * from product_tbl
